data.title: Decent enough
data.text: Stan's has decent food for the most part, but some items are better than others.  I really like the chicken fried steak and the burgers are decent, but some items, such as the fried chicken sandwich are below average.  The staff is extremely friendly, but sometimes the service can be hit or miss.

data.title: Monday night dinner out
data.text: We chose this little local Main Street restaurant for the hoped-for atmosphere and we were not disappointed. I enjoyed my catfish/shrimp basket and my husband yum-yummed through his catfish plate with a Cajun sauce on it. The others on our group were satisfied with their choices. Our server was being shadowed by a new employee and we were well-taken care of. We would definitely eat here again.

data.title: Its a bar with food - really good food!
data.text:
We were looking for a different burger place today.  My husband found this one in Yelp and we decided to go for it.

We sat at the bar and enjoyed watching the sports news while chatting with the bar tender and each other.  We both ordered the Kitchen Burger and fries.  My fries had cheese on them and it was amazing.

The burger was cooked perfectly and the bacon was crispy - which seems to be tricky in restaurants - but Stan's gets it.

They do have outdoor seating but it was too hot today to be outside.  They also have live music and other events there too.  It's a really neat bar that serves really good food.

Thanks for the fun today.  We will be back another day!

data.title: Good drink prices, that's about all
data.text: The service was incredibly slow, we weren't in a hurry but the service was horrible and we sat with empty drinks and no one to take our order for a long time.  Went early on a Friday evening and sat on a patio that wasn't full so there was no excuse for slow service.  The flies were awful on the patio. After reading multiple reviews about how great the burgers were, we were really excited but the burgers were over cooked and tasted no better than a frozen patty from a school cafeteria.  Very disappointing. The draft beer prices were cheap, and $1 off during happy hour, and the queso and cheese fries were also good.  Music started as we were leaving so it was a nice atmosphere.  Would return for drinks but never again for a meal.

data.title: They have changed.....
data.text: All opinion.  Not a place I would recommend.  They have changed and the food is sub pare on quality and flavor.  The management doesn't care anymore.

data.title: Great food
data.text:
Great food, served quickly, in a rustic cozy environment. I'm going to make this a frequent place to visit!
They have table games on each seating area. We played dominos which was a welcome break from arguing kids or resorting to using iPads!

data.title: Stopped by
data.text: Just happen to stop by this place in my way through town. Small pub,  but has some great staff and some good food with cold beer. I had the catfish po'boy and couldn't finish it, it was a large portion. Definitely will be back

data.title: Great Food Casual Spot
data.text: Came here on a Sunday after church.  First visit.  Catfish and Shrimp basket was really good, fresh and lots of food.  Fish tacos were really good as well.  The chicken fried steak was huge and very tender.  Burger was delicious.  Fries are da' bomb.  Definitely will be back.  Oh...and great music.   It's a keeper.

data.title: A little bit of everything in one place.
data.text: I would like to say that Stan’s Frisco location is doing great!  The food is consistent, the atmosphere with live music and the quick service from both the bartenders and wait staff make this place a 5 star.  When you do critique work it is not about how a particular place is in comparison to others in the world, it is how they compare to others in their area.  Most of the food items are well above on par with their competitors in Frisco.  While I did see someone say they had a better chicken fried steak somewhere else, Stan’s is not a BBQ place churning a thousand of these a day, and the one’s that they do are pretty good; and you can have a real drink for a change.  In fact their buffalo chicken sandwich is better than most of the places in Frisco churning them out and their burgers are pretty good.  Put that together with live entertainment on Thursday, Friday, and Saturday night and every other Monday, and they exceed the expectations of many of the venues in Frisco.  The music, drinks and food are worthy of a much more expensive place.  So if you find Blue Goose a little too full for you, head on over to Stan’s you might be surprised.  They have a large patio with entertainment and a great staff.  Also the patio is heated when it gets too cold.

data.title: Would be better if we drank.
data.text: Visited Stan's when most every other restaurants in that area of Frisco had waiting lines and we were ready to call it a day.  First negative impression was seeing the cook smoking a cigarette right outside the entrance door.  Not what I'd call classy.  Place was probably at half capacity. Had to flag down someone to seat us although a waiter came right by.  Food quality did not justify the above average prices.  Would be a better atmosphere if you like big screen sports and beer.  Don't go for the food alone.

data.title: Best Burgers in Frisco
data.text: We love the burgers, they taste better than anything Kennys or Jakes can offer, and they are fresh, the queso is great as well.

data.title: Great Food - Relaxed Atmosphere
data.text:
Our first visit to Stan's Grill occurred late August of 2015, and this first time it was just myself and my spouse. It was a quiet atmosphere, and the Waiter was very friendly and helpful. He asked us if we had dined at Stan's Grill before, or not. He offered helpful tips, and suggestions. Our meal tasted delicious and we have been back three times since, each time we brought our entire family. 

The only issue was once, the temperature was just a little too cool - but not a major issue. 

Overall, Stan's Grill is an affordable place to eat, and delivers quality food, which will make you want to come back again in the future.

data.title: Very Good Food and Friendly
data.text: Good food and friendly service.  Plus, they continue to upgrade their patio.  This place is really trying hard and it shows.

data.title: Really good food - Service needs to step it up a notch
data.text: The food is really, really good. Our party of seven had a variety of tastings from the menu from fried pickles, loaded cheese french fries, burgers, salads, chicken fried steak, hot dogs, fried chicken sandwich, plus more. Everyone was very pleased with their meal. It took a while for our waitress to acknowledge us after seating us. She took our drink orders and another man delivered them and said "Where do you want me to put these drinks"! LOL It was funny, but not funny all at the same time. After waiting ample time, we had to ask our waitress to take our order. We will absolutely give Stan's another try, but will definitely expect better service.
